div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Payment authorization request: Card details (tokenized), Amount, currency [via TLS/SSL, encrypted] [Standard Contractual Clauses]

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Authorization response: Approval code, Token reference [via TLS/SSL]

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Transaction processing: Payment token, Amount [via secure gateway]

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Payment confirmation: Transaction ID, Status code [via secure gateway]

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Tax reporting data: Transaction amounts, Location information, Business category [via secure API, as legally required] [No customer identifiers]

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Tax calculation rules: Rate tables, Jurisdiction codes [via API]

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Email content: Customer name, email, Invoice details [via TLS/SSL] [Data Processing Agreement]

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Delivery status: Delivery confirmations, Bounce notifications [via API]

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Audit records: Transaction samples, Financial summaries, Limited customer data [via secure portal, encrypted] [Confidentiality Agreement]
